item.title: Building Question Answering Model at Scale using ðŸ¤—Transformers
item.author: Author
item.description: Abstract In this article, you will learn how to fetch contextual answers in a huge corpus of documents using TransformersðŸ¤— Introduction We will build a neural question and answering system using transformers models (RoBERTa). This approach is capable to perform Q&A across millions of documents in few seconds. Data For this tutorial, I will use ArXiV’s research papers abstracts to do Q&A. The data is on Kaggle. Go to dataset.
